desc: Lax & Lux Candles is a black owned, woman owned, business based in Baltimore, Maryland. Lax & Lux Candles offers a collection of soy blend candles and soy wax melts that offer a more relaxing Eco-friendly experience through reLAXing scents, vibrant colors, and LUXurious experiences.

layout.text:
We OUTSIDE!!!
The Summer Vibes III collection includes:
• 4 New Scents
• 2 Returning Scents
• Infused Wax Melts
• 2 New Incense Blends
• 3 New Items
Quantities are limited!
